text:
I need to fetch timeline events via the API. There’s no documented way to do it.

What’s the recommendation? To reverse-engineer the one used in the HubSpot App? What’s the process for changing those? Is there a way to subscribe to breaking changes?
There's no "Timeline API" in the sense of pulling everything on the contact timeline, and anything that isn't documented in the developer docs is unsupported and subject to change without notice

That said, it really depends on what exactly you're trying to do. If you're trying to pull timeline info to display in another CRM, we have the contact timeline embed: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/contact-timeline-embed>

Activities, marketing emails, and property updates can also be pulled from their respective APIs: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/get_contact>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/email/get_events>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/engagements/get_associated_engagements>
